title: Unknown DirectX error
body:
Recently, after champ select my computer doesn't load the game, and an error message pops up.  It says "unknown DirectX error.  Please make sure you have the latest drivers downloaded for you video card."

I have done that.  I have uninstalled the current driver, and tried to reinstall.
-I have tried to rollback the driver.
-I have tried deleting files  'game.cfg' and 'input.txt' and folders League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_game_client and lol_game_client_en_us  (as other posts have suggested)

- I have uninstalled League of Legends, and reinstalled it.
- Other games seem to be working just fine.

Please help!  I am extremely frustrated, and trying to troubleshoot on my own is getting to me.

replies.body: same problem for me.  did all the SoP fixes and still crashes over and over with DirectX error message.  never did this with the old client.  definitely caused by upgrade to new client. reinstall and admin privileges didnt fix.
Sorry, but I'm glad I'm not the only one... haha  Freakin sucks, it is so frustrating.

This happened to me also. I was in champ slect and i locked in and then when it was moving on to load the other window for the game a small window popped up saying unknown dirext x error. This happened after the recent patch so i would like to know whats going on. My conputer is fine....what about league of legends??

I'm not sure that this is being caused by your game files, but instead a possible driver issue or OS problem failing to render the game.  Go over the steps of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide instead to troubleshoot and get this fixed up.  Let me know if that helps!

Thanks for the quick response.  

Unfortunately, I went through all of these steps (except changing the in game settings, because I can't get in game) and it still gives me the same error.  Do I need to submit a ticket to player support, with the  r3d log, DirectX Diagnostic, and  Process List attached?
Thanks for trying!  Yeah, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  You got it, attach those logs and we'll see you there!

Let's try [granting League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
